Interactive Art

Code that watches back

Art That Invites, Remembers, Changes

Installations, web experiences, simulations, and visual systems that react—sometimes uncomfortably. Interaction is not control. Presence has consequences.

Permanent Marks

User input alters the system permanently. Participation leaves residue.

Generative Visuals

Data-fed art. Long-running simulations. Art that remembers you were there.

AI Observer

AI observes interaction patterns, helps adapt or respond to human presence.

Installations

Coming soon — web-based interactive pieces, simulations, long-form generative works.
